story:
The waiters all treat you with extreme kindness. They carry you to your room on a silken glass litter.
After you arrive, they feed you a 57 course dinner, and a 33 course supper, followed by a
10 course fifth meal, which is followed by a Grand Maurace Rodele A Leche Dessert which includes
rediced sherbet made of Modal PokePin Berries imported from Mars, and 99 other sweet dishes!
